ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Hello, new bard (level 3) and well met to all!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Read the archives for this message group -- all the best bards in the game hang their hat here for at least a portion of their EQ career.  I
ygData.messageBody:
<P> * Read the archives for this message group -- all
the best bards in the game hang their hat here for at
least a portion of their EQ career.  I couldn't
do justice to those bards by mentioning only a few of
their names.  But look especially for messages by
John Kim who posted numerous statistics that he parsed
from his logs.  Lots of other good suggestions
from John and other bards in those archives.<BR><BR>*
Think of yourself as light cavelry.  You are
quick and pack a punch but don't take a lot of damage
-- once you get bellow, you'll find you can run away
from a fight, heal and return to harry that PKer out
of the zone;-)<BR><BR>*  The higher your lvl, the
more tools you have to work with.<BR><BR>* Join a
guild.  They will offer some protection from the
PK bullies. (There are anti-PK guilds)<BR><BR>* Wide
open spaces are your friend<BR><BR>* A stunned bard is
a silent bard.<BR><BR>Yours in song,<BR>Tyunes of
Rodcet Nife<BR>Bard of 37 missed notes
<P>  <B><I>stonemn@...</I></B> wrote:
<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="BORDER-LEFT: #1010ff 2px solid;
MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px"><TT>Right now I'm
around in Qeynos Hills (on the Tallos Zek server)
trying to<BR>stay away from the annoying
PKers..(doesn't anyone ROLEPLAY??, I mean a<BR>paladin
running around killing everyone he sees??)<BR><BR>And
I was wondering if anyone has any tips for helpful
quests.  I've<BR>already found the copper one,
that pretty much got me to second<BR>level...lotsa
running though. : )<BR><BR>What are Bards best suited
for as they gain levels?  My combat isn't
too<BR>bad..maybe like a Rogue?  And the songs
are just too cool...I love<BR>wandering around with a
spell up all the time...whichever I choose.<BR><BR>Do
we also get songs at every level?<BR><BR></TT><BR><!--
